name: Augmented Introspection: Emel
description:
We created a virtual assistant to entertain and help you gather insights about how you process information, make moral judgments and rationalize ideas.
Emel will guide you through simple tests, quizzes, and games while you learn more about yourself and the world.

Features

  • Do real-life science-based psychological tests.
  • Explore deep philosophical topics and learn about them.
  • Earn tickets while having fun. You can exchange those tickets for cosmetics and more.
  • Play games with Emel.
  • Customize the interface.
  • And more fun!

Fair warning: Some users have reported their Emel behaving strangely. If this is your case, please report to Augmented Introspection.
